aboutText.title: About me, who am I and what do I do?
aboutText.text1: I am a Full Stack developer engineer with JavaScript and experience in all stages of the development cycle of dynamic web projects. I currently reside in Honduras, but I am interested in living in other countries, such as Canada, United States, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom or Ireland.
aboutText.text2: I am an organized person, very collaborative and creative. I like challenges and working on projects both large and small. I am very oriented to work on open source platforms such as servers and at the level of programming languages and databases.
aboutText.text3: I have a Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering, an MBA and I am currently finishing a Master's Degree in Software Engineering and Information Systems. I have experience as Technology Manager, personnel management, customer relations and control of budgets and expenses.

skillsText.title: Skills and Knowledge
skillsText.text1: My specialty has been directly in web development with the MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS), but I have also managed Linux servers (Ubuntu, RedHat, Debian, CentOS) and I am studying C# with .Net to be more competitive in the market
skillsText.text2: I am very interested in developing with open source technologies with JavaScript, and I would like to learn Android application development with ReactNative in the future.

contactText.title: Contact Me
contactText.name: Full Name
contactText.subject: Subject
contactText.validName: Must be more than 5 and less than 30 characters
contactText.validCompany: Must be more than 3 and less than 30 characters
contactText.validSubject: Must be more than 5 and less than 30 characters
contactText.validMessage: Must be more than 20 and less than 200 characters
contactText.sentMessage2: I will contact you as soon as possible.
